title: Cheating Heart, A Vienna Rossi Paranormal Mystery: A Vienna Rossi Paranormal Mystery
description: After seeing her ex-boyfriend with another woman, her gorgeous spirit guide whom she could never have a relationship with, and a date with a well known office Romeo on Valentine’s Day; Vienna’s best friend talks her into a weekend getaway to clear her head. Little did she know that she’d not only have to deal with her cheating heart, but a lost soul in need of help.  Will Vienna be able to heal her own heart in order to find love? Will she be able to get to the source of the turmoil causing the dark spirit to haunt her?  Join Vienna, Kim, and hunky spirit guide Jack in another hauntingly fun adventure.
author: Michelle Ann Hollstein
